title: Beautiful 2x2 home, located in the Lake Hills Village
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Villas in Bellevue Apartments', 'Welcome Home!', 'Convenience and sophistication take center stage at The Villas in Bellevue apartments.', "Located in Bellevue's Lake Hills neighborhood, our location allows you to step outside to Lake Hills Village, where dining, shopping, and many services await you.", 'Amplify your expectations with nearby Marymoor Park and its many amenities and concert series.', "If you don't feel like leaving home, sit back and be a part of our very own outdoor concert event steps away in the Village Plaza Amphitheater.", 'Enjoy your own private veranda, or spend time with friends at one of the many trendy locales in the Village Plaza.', 'On those summer weekends, don’t forget the Farmer’s Market, where you can pick up fresh, local produce.', 'In your backyard, you will find a lush greenbelt where you can tour a cedar forest and learn about local wildlife.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 4', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 940 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Heated', '- Two, three, and four bedroom apartment homes', '- Cable/satellite ready', '- Large walk-in closets', '- Dual master bedrooms*', '- Microwave', '- Gourmet kitchens with black appliances', '- Wheelchair Access', '- 5 Bedroom townhomes', '- Lofty nine-foot ceilings*', '- Picturesque views', '- Private dining rooms with breakfast bars', '- Large patios and balconies', '- Washer and dryer included', 'Community Amenities', '- Located on greenbelt', '- Amphitheater', '- On public transportation line', '- Minutes from Bellevue College', '- Easy freeway access', '- Underground parking garage', '- Access to restaurants and more', '- Next to King County Library', '- Minutes from Crossroads Mall', '- On-site Maintenance', '- Near hiking trails', '- Online payments available', '- Local farmers market', 'Pet Policy', 'Max 2 Allowed | One time Fee $300', 'Rent $35-$50 | Deposit $300', 'Comments: Cats and Dogs allowed.', 'breed restrictions apply.', 'Cats', 'Max 2 Allowed | One time Fee $300', 'Rent $35 | Deposit $300', 'Dogs', 'Max 2 Allowed | One time Fee $300', 'Rent $50 |
